attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WHY IS IT THAT IF YOU HAVE KIDNEY DAILYSIS AT HOME YOU CAN CLAIM DISABILITY BENIFIT BUT IF YOU HAVE DAILYSIS IN THE HOSPITAL YOU CANT.MY 23 YEAR OLD DAUGHTER HAS HERS IN THE HOSPITAL,SHE STILL HAS TO BE THERE 3 DAYS A WEEK AND AFTER EVERY DAILYSIS SHE FEELS ILL THAT DAY AND THE DAY AFTER IF SHES UNABLE TO DO WHAT A HEALTHY HUMAN BEING DOES,THEN SHE HAS A DISABILITY,AS SHE CANNOT DO WHAT WE ALL TAKE FOR GRANTED.AFTER ALL WITHOUT DAILYSIS SHE WOULDNT BE HERE.DAILYSIS PATIENTS SHOULD ALSO BE ABLE TO RECIEVE ANY BENIFITS THEY HAVE HERE IF THEY MOVE TO AN EU COUNTRY,WHY IS SUCH A SERIOUS CONDITION ORGAN FAILURE UNDERVALUED.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
